preface.title: Foreword
preface.para: For years a book called The Design of OS/2 was recommended by programmers as a reference for everyone who wants to write an operating system. The book gave an insight into the design of a modern operating system at the time but was still easy to read also for not that experienced programmers.

This document tries to provide the same for The Voyager Project, an attempt to create an object oriented workplace for the 21th century. The ultimate goal is to make it easy for new programmers to join the project. This book will give you a starting point for that.
